DOC.brief_title: The Metabolite Identification Material Balance Study SP2086
DOC.detailed_description: All subject give SP2086 100mg one time , blood sample collect 96 hour medicine take .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer body mass index ( BMI ) 19 25 Kg/m2 , weight â‰¥50kg . Lab examination result normal mildly abnormal without clinical significance , clinical doctor consider eligible . Had sign inform consent voluntarily . Has history severe system disease , family history ( include cardiovascular system , digestive system , urinary system , etc. ) . Has history allergy intolerance SP2086 OR DPPIV . The subject participate 3 time 3 time drug clinical subject nearly year ; participate drug clinical trial prior test 3 month , blood donor , plan blood donor three month test ; transfusion 4 week . Did take effective contraceptive measure plan subject half year . Researchers consider patient adherence poor , unfavorable factor suit participate test .
